data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dow, Rory A. (2011): Mortonagrion indraneil spec. nov. from Borneo, and a redescription of M. arthuri Fraser (Odonata: Zygoptera: Coenagrionidae). Zootaxa 3093: 35-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201683
